mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_name, student_id, member_photo_path, member_class, member_grade, motto, group_id, have_graduated, after_graduation) VALUES (#{member.memberName}, #{member.studentId}, #{member.memberPhotoPath}, #{member.memberClass}, #{member.memberGrade}, #{member.motto}, #{member.group.groupId}, #{member.haveGraduated}, #{member.afterGraduation})
